items.sentence: Tom was yelling at me, the baby was crying and then my phone started ringing.
It was against school rules to wear makeup at the high school that I went to.
By the time the bus arrived at the hotel, most of the passengers were asleep.
The wicked witch cast an evil spell on the man and turned him into an insect.
My bonus doesn't come close to covering all the loan payments I have to make.
If the delay is simply an oversight, will you please take care of it at once?
This guy is really wishy-washy. He couldn't make a decision to save his life.
Hikers need to carry a compass with them to find their way through the woods.
No matter how hard you may study, you cannot master English in a year or two.
At long last, the two chiefs of the Indian tribes have decided to make peace.
